report.title: Calm Happiness
report.author: lokicola
report.bodytext: At around noon one day I decided to drop a 12 hour slow-release morphine tablet as I had several times before. /n /n It was an amazing feeling as usual, like someone giving me a full body massage and freeing me of any pain. /n /n Later after I had gotten off work at 5, the effects of the morphine in full swing at this point, I decided to smoke a little blunt. /n /n As I smoked I could feel any and every amount of tension release with my exhales as I was overcome with a sense of warmth and security. /n /n This was one of the most intense highs I had ever experienced that lasted the whole day.
